TopicTitle: No keyboard input on a Mac

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.10.1.2939

MacOS: 10.13.6

Coming back to Kerbal after a while. I updated and launched the app. It doesn't seem to be taking any keyboard input. Can't enter text in text fields. Can't throttle up, etc. I don't have any mods. I've tried rebooting. The executable itself seems to be getting keyboard events (Command-Q quits for example).

 

Any thoughts?
